nlx-update-neos-templates-button.label: Update Enterprise Content Platform Templates
nlx-update-neos-templates-button.success: The Enterprise Content Platform templates have been updated.
nlx-update-neos-templates-button.error-title: The Enterprise Content Platform templates could not be updated.
nlx-update-neos-templates-button.error: An unknown error occurred. The Enterprise Content Platform server might be unreachable or the connection is interrupted.

nlx-invalidate-cms-page-caches-button.label: Clear Caches of Linked CMS Pages
nlx-invalidate-cms-page-caches-button.success: The caches of the linked CMS pages have been cleared.
nlx-invalidate-cms-page-caches-button.error-title: The caches of the linked CMS pages could not be cleared.
